title:
My family and I spent the weekend at the beach.

attachments.displayName:
My family and I spent the weekend at the beach.
My 87 year old father went sailing on his Sunfish.
The very clear and sunny weather
turned foul suddenly and he was far out!
There was thunder and lightning and he was out there
with the metal mast of his sailboat sticking out.
He said, "Napadasal ako!" "I had to pray!"
Thank you God, he was able to get the boat back to shore!
Life is like that.
It can be very serene, peaceful. Everything going right!
Then something unexpected happens.
We just need to wait on the Lord!
Wait with courage, be stouthearted!!!
We need to be peacemakers- not only for others,
but for ourselves as well!
When things get rough, we need to find the peace
that is beyond understanding.
I think being a peacemaker is a step by step process.
http://patsypat.blogspot.com/2013/11/life-is-like-that.html

object.content:
My family and I spent the weekend at the beach.
My 87 year old father went sailing on his Sunfish.
The very clear and sunny weather
turned foul suddenly and he was far out!
There was thunder and lightning and he was out there
with the metal mast of his sailboat sticking out.
He said, "Napadasal ako!" "I had to pray!"
Thank you God, he was able to get the boat back to shore!
Life is like that.
It can be very serene, peaceful. Everything going right!
Then something unexpected happens.
We just need to wait on the Lord!
Wait with courage, be stouthearted!!!
We need to be peacemakers- not only for others,
but for ourselves as well!
When things get rough, we need to find the peace
that is beyond understanding.
I think being a peacemaker is a step by step process.
http://patsypat.blogspot.com/2013/11/life-is-like-that.html
